name: CAT Fusion
description: CAT Fusion is the first Telegram-based hyper-casual game on the Nervos Network (CKB), a Bitcoin Layer 2 blockchain, designed to engage players with a rewarding and interactive experience. Players battle bosses, upgrade their cat-themed digital assets, and compete on leaderboards to earn rewards, likely in the form of CKB tokens or NFTs. Built on CKB’s secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, CAT Fusion leverages the RGB++ protocol for managing in-game assets, ensuring secure and trustless interactions. Recently awarded a grant by the CKB Eco Fund, CAT Fusion is expanding its community with planned collaborations, airdrop campaigns, and an official beta launch, enhancing its role in the Nervos ecosystem.

highlights.title: First Telegram Hyper-Casual Game
highlights.description: Pioneers blockchain gaming on CKB as the first Telegram-based hyper-casual game, offering accessible and engaging gameplay via a popular messaging platform

highlights.title: CKB Eco Fund Grant
highlights.description: Received funding from the CKB Eco Fund to support community growth, partnerships, airdrops, and the official beta launch, boosting ecosystem integration

faq.a: CAT Fusion is a Telegram-based hyper-casual game where players engage in boss battles, upgrade their cat-themed digital assets (e.g., NFTs representing unique cats), and compete on leaderboards to earn rewards such as CKB tokens or exclusive in-game items. Players can enhance their cats’ abilities, participate in time-based challenges, and trade assets within the Nervos ecosystem, leveraging the RGB++ protocol for secure transactions.

faq.q: Does it support UTXO Global Telegram wallet?
faq.a: Yes, CAT Fusion is likely to support integration with the UTXO Global Telegram wallet, given its role as a leading wallet interface in the Nervos ecosystem. This allows players to manage their in-game assets (e.g., cat NFTs and CKB rewards) seamlessly within Telegram, utilizing UTXO Global’s features like RGB++ asset management and cross-platform synchronization for a streamlined gaming experience.
